com.cipherlibrary

Class Rot13Encryptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cipherlibrary.Encryptor
      • com.cipherlibrary.CaesarEncryptor
        • com.cipherlibrary.Rot13Encryptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Encryptable

    public class Rot13Encryptor
extends CaesarEncryptor
    Represents a machine, which can encrypt or decrypt text, adding 13 to a position of a letter in an alphabet (starting from 1)

        public Rot13Encryptor(CipherMode mode)
        Creates a new Rot13Encryptor with the given perimeters.
        Parameters:
        mode - can be chosen from LETTERS_ONLY, PUNCTUATION_MARKS and SPACES.
